[{"id":"LR-103","entityId":"2-222","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"LR"},{"name":"summary","value":"Add workdays selection"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Andrii Aleksieiev"},{"name":"created","value":"1565094043626"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"103"},{"name":"description","value":"

As a user I want to be able select workdays on foodlord/weekly-menu page by clicking on 'workdays' button.

Acceptance criteria:

  • Clicking on 'workdays' button shows row of checkboxes under the tabs.
  • Checkboxes are prepopulated in a following way:
    • checked for default (Mon - Fri)
    • unchecked for default (Sat - Sun)
  • Clicking on checkbox checks or unchecks and enable or disable the day tab it`s located under.

"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Yurii Vashkiv"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"bpetryshyn"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"yvashkiv"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1565014283155"},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["TechDebt"],"valueId":["TechDebt"],"color":{"bg":"#e0c378","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"LR-26","entityId":"2-56","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"LR"},{"name":"summary","value":"Display counter for every dish on their cards on eater page"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Nazar Vivchar"},{"name":"created","value":"1561378882441"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"26"},{"name":"description","value":"

As a User, I want to see a checkbox on a card of every dish and to be able to check/uncheck these checkboxes.

Acceptance criteria

  • Every card with a dish has a counter
  • Counter allows to increase/decrease the number in it
  • Counter is displayed as on a mockup
"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Olena Pylypiv"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"nvivchar"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"opylypiv"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"updated","value":"1563973344410"},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Task"],"valueId":["Task"],"color":{"bg":"#246512","fg":"#fff"}},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"Ideal days","value":["2"],"valueId":["2"],"color":null},{"name":"attachments","value":[{"value":"Desktop (4).png","id":"7-23","url":"https://its.intelliarts.com/_persistent/Desktop%20(4).png?file=7-23&c=true"}]}],"comment":[],"tag":[{"value":"eater","cssClass":"c10"}]}, {"id":"LR-32","entityId":"2-74","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"LR"},{"name":"summary","value":"Show counter only on selected dish cards"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"admin"},{"name":"created","value":"1562164049319"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"32"},{"name":"description","value":"

As a user, I can see counter only on selected dish cards

Acceptance criteria

  • Click on the dish card toggles the select state of the card
  • Counter is shown on selected cards only
  • Counter should be set to 1 in case user selects the dish card
  • Counter should be set to 0 in case user deselects the dish card

as a user i can have an opportunity to delete dish item when opening item`s details page

Acceptance criteria

  • there is delete button on details page of each item
  • button style and positioning is up to UI mockup

","shownForIssueAuthor":false,"created":1562250731199,"updated":0,"permittedGroup":null,"markdown":true,"replies":[]}],"tag":[]}, {"id":"LR-8","entityId":"2-22","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"LR"},{"name":"summary","value":"Show delete button on foodlord page when user selects several items of dish list"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Nina Novoselska"},{"name":"created","value":"1561118231780"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"8"},{"name":"description","value":"

As a user i can see a button 'delete' when i select at least one item of dish in list using checkboxes beside them

Acceptance criteria

  • selection of any count of items in list causes appearance of delete button
  • button style and positioning is up to UI mockup
